name: Little Bastard
description:
Your job is to set the diplomatic stance (exploration / defensif / agressif) of your kingdom.
Each stance is at war with the two others, so you better change at the right moment or you'll be obliterate.

Features:
- Single player story
- 4 player multiplayer on a single screen (1 Mouse + 1 keyboard + 2 gamepads)
- Random map Generator
- up to 27 players
- up to 99*99 map size

If you like it, check our other games : https://andreilgame.itch.io/
